Text:
This is NOT a BDrip

While I thank you for the effort, all other sites have relabelled this torrent as a HDRIP and a bad one at that due to the cropping.

A=6
V=3


wait...........................

This is seriously disappointing. Over 5 hours to DL only to find rar files in 86parts - WTF for????????? seriously dude... and on top of that... it is HORRIBLY cropped - probably from hard Korean - and definitely NOT BDRip. Very, very, very... VERY, disappointing.
Agree with Velicity....will wait for better quality!
It's another attempted con trick, scenebalance can now join hackulus in the mislabelled to make u DL section! lol

@velicity and hkgrguy and others complaining about this being cropped, change the aspect ratio on your media player (I use VLC) to 16:9 and you will get a perfectly watchable picture almost full screen. Many thanks to Voodoo for a very good upload.

to jed1421 - i tried playing around with the various aspect ratios of course, I also run on VLC, and the closest I got to a "watchable" picture is 2.35:1... "watchable" - NOT BDRip or HD... and crappy crop because the hard coded subs can still be seen (slightly though)... therefore STILL very, very, very disappointing... especially coming from scenebalance who is supposed to be trusted... I'll wait for a true BDRip to
... BTW, OMT: DVD premiere is June 27, 2012, Amazon will have the DVD/BluRay available on June 12th, 2012... 4 any1 who cares...
